name: Time Astronaut
description:
This is a prototype game developed for the FAESA GAME JAM. Play trough the level and find the hearts to complete it, try to stay alive while dodging traps and use time travel to turn back in time when needed.

Use:

WASD or UP/Down and Left/Right Arrows - to move;

Space - to jump;

Left click or Left Crtl - for time travel;
